sentence.Network_en: Mona remains unshaken by her ordeal and is matter-of-fact about her courage.
sentence.Network_cn: 莫娜不为她经历的这场磨难所动，对自己表现出的勇气也态度淡然。

sentence.Network_en: They remain unshaken in their loyalty.
His faith that men such as the Reverend John Leale tried to do their best is unshaken.
sentence.Network_cn: 他始终深信约翰·莱亚莱神父等人已经尽了全力了。

" Before Merc é d è s should die , " replied Fernand , with the accents of unshaken resolution , " I would die myself ! "“如果美塞苔丝死了,”弗尔南多语气坚决地说,“那我也情愿死.”

entry.def: If your beliefs are unshaken, you still have those beliefs, although they have been attacked or challenged.

example.ex: His faith that men such as the Reverend John Leale tried to do their best is unshaken.
example.tran: 他始终深信约翰·莱亚莱神父等人已经尽了全力了。

entry.tran: (情感上)不为所动的，不受影响的
entry.def: If you are unshaken by something, you are not emotionally affected by it.

example.ex: Mona remains unshaken by her ordeal and is matter-of-fact about her courage.
example.tran: 莫娜不为她经历的这场磨难所动，对自己表现出的勇气也态度淡然。

sentences.sentence: "wholly undismayed by the commercial failure of the three movies he had made"
